name: (Prediction) Circuit break pattern
motivation: When the amount or frequency of requests to prediction suddenly increases, it can outpace the velocity of scaling. Complete outages are to avoid
solution: It is reasonable to choose to cancel a certain number of request to stabilize the current prediction service, until the scale out completes to respond all the predictions.
consequences:
Pros: Avoid complete outage of the service.
It allows to scale out prediction servers without lowering the current resource availability. Cons:Requires a fallback plan for cancelled requests.
